title: "Wow, look how broken Riven is!"
body:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=https%3A%2F%2F38.media.tumblr.com%2F229d11f846aa1b6a6093d3530b0ca6cc%2Ftumblr_nho3wx4wDO1sdk5d7o1_r1_500.gif&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425

I mean, let's not discuss that 4 weak enemy players were touching each other and the Riven hit absolutely every ability on them, leading with the knockup.

I could also mention that it looks like the enemy team were also all glass. The Jayce has the highest maximum HP at around ~1400HP.

Stop being brainless shitters, learn the game.

The enemy team deserves to lose for that, if you think that is the sign of a "broken" champion... you need to learn positioning.
